text: I just redirected from drummer.scripting.com to drummer.land. So you can use Drummer once again. It's been down since Feb 4, while it was retooled for email-based identity and HTTPS. It all appears to work as well as it did when we previously did identity with Twitter. It has been a really stressful couple of weeks, while working with developers on getting FeedLand open source release out, I had to also rip up Drummer and put in a new identity system. All the code was written but it still was an ugly transition, one you hope to never have to do. Report problems here. Remember to give us steps to reproduce. If we don't understand what the problem it'll be hard to fix it.
